sentence: Both Sen. Joe Manchin (D-W.Va.) and Sen. Mark Kelly (D-Ariz.) said Tuesday that they were undecided about Gonzalez and planned to spend more time reviewing the allegations against him.
title: White House tries to avoid a Raskin repeat as ICE pick teeters in Senate

sentence: Kyrsten Sinema and Mark Kelly and West Virginia Sen. Joe Manchin eventually joined Republicans to vote against proceeding with the nomination.
title: Moderate Dems hand Biden his first nomination vote defeat

sentence: Joe Manchin of West Virginia and Kyrsten Sinema and Mark Kelly of Arizona opposed the nomination.
author: Mark Moore
title: Biden pick for Labor post defeated in Senate — with three Dems opposing

sentence: They were also joined by Mark Kelly, Arizona’s other senator.
title: Biden embarrassed by Senate defeat
